name: Bunker 501
description:
I am a game developer and I love hardcore games, porn so I decided to create Bunker 501 – a hardcore adult game.

Bunker 501 is a third-person zombie shooter survival game. Follow the story of the game. You'll have the choice to seduce and build deep relationship with survivor of those communities. Killing zombies, discover places, complete mission. etc... all there for you to explore !

This is the public version. You can access to latest version via my Patreon
